data.description: Send UTF8 text/html email with attachments
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Mail::Builder::Simple is based on Mail::Builder and Email::Send. It
    can be used for sending UTF-8 encoded email messages (the body and
    headers). The text and html parts and the attachments can be created
    from a template.

    The users who want to send an UTF-8 encoded email with attachments
    and inline images don't need to encode the headers to UTF-8 because
    they are encoded automaticly as well as the body of the message, and
    they don't need to specify the Content-Type for the attachments,
    inline images or the HTML part of the message.
